Name: prince_william_2009_rdedges
LayerDisplayName: Road Edge, Prince William County, VA
Originator: Prince William County Office of Information Technology
OriginatorSort: Prince William County Office of Information Technology
Abstract: This dataset contains line feature class showing pavement edges for roads and travel ways in the Prince William County,VA

    <descript>
      <abstract>This dataset contains line feature class showing pavement edges for roads and travel ways in the Prince William County,VA</abstract>
      <purpose>This layer is used as a cartographic overlay on several paper and digital map products. It is also used in various web interactive mapping applications such as County Mapper and Demographic Mapper</purpose>
    </descript>

    <lineage>
      <procstep>
        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the cd obtained from Prince William County, 2009
This dataset is continuously updated as new roads are approved in the county. Sources used for updating this dataset include: subdivision plans, final approved site plans and VDOT highway plans.  A variety of techniques are used to capture the data, some of these include COGO, scanning and aerial photo-interpretation.</procdesc>
        <procdate>Unknown</procdate>
      </procstep>
